Digital Currency Group

USA | Related people:
  • Barry Silbert (Founder and CEO)
  • Mark Murphy (President)
Digital Currency Group is a venture capital company, and the parent company of Grayscale Investments, the bankrupt Genesis brokerage, and, formerly, the CoinDesk crypto media outlet.
